# AISkillScore

> AISkillScore is an AI-powered career intelligence platform with 11 tools for resume optimization, job matching, interview prep, and career growth. Pay per use with tokens — no subscriptions.

AISkillScore helps job seekers and career changers understand exactly where they stand. Paste a job posting or resume and get an honest AI assessment with evidence in 30 seconds. Tools range from free (AI Displacement Score) to 20 tokens (AI Headshots), with token packs starting at $9.

## Core AI Tools

- [AI Displacement Score](https://aiskillscore.com/tools/displacement): Free tool — see which of your tasks AI can replace, and which can't. Uses ILO 2025 data.
- [JD Match Score](https://aiskillscore.com/tools/jd_match): 2 tokens — how well you match a job posting, scored with evidence from your actual resume.
- [Resume Optimizer](https://aiskillscore.com/tools/resume): 10 tokens — ATS-optimized resume that still sounds like you. No detectable AI cliches.
- [Cover Letter](https://aiskillscore.com/tools/cover_letter): 3 tokens — tailored cover letter written from your actual experience, not templates.
- [LinkedIn Optimizer](https://aiskillscore.com/tools/linkedin): 10 tokens — profile optimized for LinkedIn's 2026 AI recruiter algorithm.
- [AI Headshots](https://aiskillscore.com/tools/headshots): 20 tokens — professional headshots in minutes using AI, not hours in a studio.
- [Interview Prep](https://aiskillscore.com/tools/interview): 3 tokens — likely questions plus follow-ups, with coached answers.
- [Skills Gap Analysis](https://aiskillscore.com/tools/skills_gap): 5 tokens — what's missing for your target role plus a plan to close it.
- [Career Roadmap](https://aiskillscore.com/tools/roadmap): 8 tokens — job hunt and income plan with weekly checkpoints.
- [Salary Negotiation](https://aiskillscore.com/tools/salary): 3 tokens — market data plus word-for-word negotiation scripts.
- [Entrepreneurship Assessment](https://aiskillscore.com/tools/entrepreneurship): 8 tokens — business ideas based on skills you already have.

## Pricing

- [Pricing](https://aiskillscore.com/pricing): Pay per use. No subscriptions. Starter ($9/50 tokens), Pro ($19/200 tokens), Power ($49/500 tokens).
- [Lifetime Deal](https://aiskillscore.com/lifetime): From $79 one-time for 100 tokens/month forever. Limited to 500 early bird spots.

## How It Works

1. Paste a job description, LinkedIn URL, or resume text into the Smart Input
2. AI detects the input type and routes to the right tool
3. Get evidence-based analysis in 30 seconds using Gemini 2.5 Pro
4. Use results to optimize your resume, prep for interviews, and land your target role

## Key Differentiators

- 11 AI tools in one platform vs competitors offering 1-2 tools at $29-$149/month
- Pay per use with tokens (no subscriptions)
- Evidence-based analysis, not generic keyword counting
- Preserves your authentic voice instead of rewriting into AI cliches
- Dual-track approach: job hunting + income building simultaneously
- Free daily tokens (2/day) plus 15 free tokens on signup

## Blog — Guides & Research

- [Will AI Replace My Job?](https://aiskillscore.com/blog/will-ai-replace-my-job): Measure your personal AI displacement risk using ILO 2025 data. 1 in 4 roles are exposed to generative AI.
- [ATS Resume Optimization Guide](https://aiskillscore.com/blog/resume-ats-optimization-guide): 43% of ATS rejections are formatting errors. Complete guide to passing ATS in 2026.
- [AI Interview Prep Guide](https://aiskillscore.com/blog/ai-interview-prep-guide): 90% of candidates aren't prepared for follow-up questions — the part that actually decides interviews.
- [Salary Negotiation Scripts](https://aiskillscore.com/blog/salary-negotiation-scripts-2026): 76% of professionals who negotiate earn $5,000-$10,000 more. Word-for-word scripts included.
- [Skills Gap Analysis for Career Changers](https://aiskillscore.com/blog/skills-gap-analysis-career-change): 68% of career changers underestimate their transferable skills. Bridge role strategy explained.
- [LinkedIn Optimization Guide](https://aiskillscore.com/blog/linkedin-optimization-recruiter-algorithm): How LinkedIn's 2026 recruiter algorithm ranks profiles, and how to optimize for maximum visibility.

## Comparisons

- [AISkillScore vs Jobscan](https://aiskillscore.com/compare/aiskillscore-vs-jobscan): 11 tools from free vs $49.95/month for keyword counting.
- [AISkillScore vs Teal](https://aiskillscore.com/compare/aiskillscore-vs-teal): AI-personalized content vs generic templates at $29/month.
- [AISkillScore vs FinalRound AI](https://aiskillscore.com/compare/aiskillscore-vs-finalround): Interview prep from $0.23 vs $149/month, plus 10 more tools.
- [AISkillScore vs Kickresume](https://aiskillscore.com/compare/aiskillscore-vs-kickresume): AI analysis + 10 tools vs template-based resume builder at $19/month.
- [AISkillScore vs Resume.io](https://aiskillscore.com/compare/aiskillscore-vs-resumeio): Strategy-focused AI optimization vs design-focused templates at $24.95/month.

## Company

- [Privacy Policy](https://aiskillscore.com/privacy): AES-256 encryption, no data selling, auto-delete after 90 days
- [Terms of Service](https://aiskillscore.com/terms): Token-based pricing, AI guidance disclaimer

## Optional

- [Sign Up](https://aiskillscore.com/auth): Create a free account with 15 tokens
- [Referral Program](https://aiskillscore.com/referral): Give 5 tokens, get 10 for each referral
